title: Warwick is so balanced after 2 items...
body: I was playing against a warwick and he was feeding...but when he got 2 items for lifesteal he was unbeatable can you nerf a little bit because this stuff is not as balanced as other champions...               ]{{champion:84}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3146}}

replies.body: he has always been known as a sustain champ, so you gotta burst him down a bit, i was playing with my lil bro in nexus seige, lb got him low (he had rav i think tho) so they both just kept autoing eachother and he got the kill, cuz he survived by the bees dick. (when i say he i mean my lil bro the ww)
